name: Francesca's Zucchini Carpaccio
keywords: arugula, parmigiano-reggiano, zucchini, low-carb, raw, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup tightly packed, roughly chopped arugula leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the zucchini into paper-thin rounds on a mandoline or meat slicer, or with a 1-millimeter food-processor blade. Lay the slices on a large serving platter. Sprinkle the arugula over the zucchini. Drizzle with the oil and balsamic vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Shave curls of Parmigiano directly over the platter to cover the zucchini and arugula. Serve immediately.
